option.info:
Lauren Lentini Photography Studio

Studio & On Location Photography

Over the past 15 years, professional photgrapher Lauren Lentini of Lauren Lentini Photography Sudios has gracefully earned her reputation as one of Houston's preferred photographers. Her workd has been described as "refreshingly honest, pure & original". Her warmth, patience and dedication to the craft allow her subjects to glow in her images.
Click here please
